name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Leone Abbacchio
summary:
Bucciarati's team is fully reunited in All-Star Battle R with the playable character addition of Leone Abbacchio and his detective stand, Moody Jazz. Make your opponents think twice and see double with Leone Abbacchio! Available Now!

Contents:
- Leone Abbacchio as a playable character
- Additional Leone Abbacchio JoJo Glossary, Model Viewer, Sound Test, and Art Viewer
- Additional Leone Abbacchio collection items at the in-game store
